question: 助手
sourceMnemonic: Remember how <ja>手</ja> can mean a "doer" in some words? What do you think your <kanji>help</kanji> <kanji>doer</kanji> is? It’s someone who helps you, so it’s your <vocabulary>assistant</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>helper</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>aid</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You learned the on'yomi reading of <ja>手</ja> with the vocabulary word <ja>投手</ja>.
